data.current_summary: Read a batch of payments by internal ID, or unique property values
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve multiple payment objects in a single batch request using internal IDs or unique property values. Accepts a batch read request specifying the payment identifiers and optional properties to return. Returns a batch response containing the requested payment objects with their properties and any errors encountered during retrieval. No state changes occur.
